channel.title: Load a client and connect to local host
channel.description:
ok so i tried to start my own server... i have all the downlaod things and when i load up my source (chassyscape) its says this...
-chassyscape v1 - ..online!
then nothing else happens. i asked somebody for some help and they told me to load a client and connect to local host i was like.. ok wtf? so i asked him what that meant and he bassically told me to get a bigger brain. im new at this, and im only just learning, so can somebody please explain what he means by "load a client and connect to local host" please
thanks for your time guys

item.title: Load a client and connect to local host
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

reapagescapeftw:

ugh in ur client connect to 127.0.0.1 thats ur batch ip hope this helps

Haven’t you noticed that someone has already posted the solution and your just bumping a solved post!

Read full topic
item.source: Load a client and connect to local host

item.title: Load a client and connect to local host
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Use “localhost” “0.0.0.0” “127.0.0.1” or leave the IP spot blank.

Read full topic
item.source: Load a client and connect to local host
